title: rahulzx
author: rahulzx
content: There is new trending of NFT cartoon Avatars generated by AI. Do you participate any of these projects which backed by reputed organizations?

comments.author: Godday
comments.body: That raises the pros and cons.  Because cartoon NFTs that are generated by AI do allow content creators to create unlimited possibilities regarding their works of art.  AI assistance greatly helps NFT artists to find and define fresh ideas and makes it easier to create many digital works.  But the existence of AI will also make the value of the NFT decrease because almost anyone can make similar cartoons using the help of AI.  I think these positive and negative things should be well thought out.  But if asked for my opinion, I choose to support this ongoing trend.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: rahulzx on March 06, 2023, 08:42:18 AMThere is new trending of NFT cartoon Avatars generated by AI. If they're generated by AI, then that means that they're free. Thus, NFTs popularity were already gone and why is it that there are still some people are into it? Maybe there's still the little market that it has got.Quote from: rahulzx on March 06, 2023, 08:42:18 AMDo you participate any of these projects which backed by reputed organizations?Nope. So this means that these organizations that you prolly seen have been generating AI images and making it as NFTs? is that right?CMIIW.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Well, I just hope the person who generates it knows what they're doing. At least, they'd be producing good-looking NFTs now, compared to the monkey age we had back then. Though ig it'd honestly just look better, I don't think anything can top what some of the stable diffusion results that I've seen people make, and they do it with a big passion, I reckon more than these projects that are just riding in the hype. Even with the help of AI, if they can't make anything unique at all that could possibly last, I don't think they're going to come back up.

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: With the influx of AI-generated NFTs in the space, I believe at first it would be seen as a good thing but with time it will be diluted in value because almost everyone will be doing it with time the value for human-created NFTs and Avatars will increase significantly from good creators because there will be demand for them and their value will increase significantly as people see the differentiation between the two

comments.author: avikz
comments.body: Quote from: rahulzx on March 06, 2023, 08:42:18 AMThere is new trending of NFT cartoon Avatars generated by AI. Do you participate any of these projects which backed by reputed organizations?Lol! No! Never! NFTs are anyways useless! But when it is generated by AI, that literally means no effort has gone into creating that particular piece of shit. No human effort at all which makes it a bad investment already. Regardless of the backing, that's useless and AI can generate the same image once again. So there's no guarantee about it's uniqueness as well. So I would not invest in such NFTs ever.

comments.author: wajik-tempe
comments.body: Quote from: rahulzx on March 06, 2023, 08:42:18 AMThere is new trending of NFT cartoon Avatars generated by AI. Do you participate any of these projects which backed by reputed organizations?AI cartoon makers are wild right now, you could find hundreds free apps that could generate various and pretty good animation AI. So holding an NFT for any of these are not valueable for me because everyone will able to have their own.I don't think any reputed organizations will have these kind of business but it depends or the market needs.

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.created_time: March 06, 2023, 04:57:31 PMLast edit: March 06, 2023, 05:52:27 PM by @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: rahulzx on March 06, 2023, 08:42:18 AMThere is new trending of NFT cartoon Avatars generated by AI. Do you participate any of these projects which backed by reputed organizations?Yes. I participated in a few BNB chain projects including lifeform and Second Live projects. In both cases, we have to create an avatar.  I think they are targeting web 3.0 and the metaverses. So there will be a lot of use cases including like create to earn and stake-to-earn scenarios. If you minted an avatar, then you can participate to live quizzes and AMA sessions.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: rahulzx on March 06, 2023, 08:42:18 AMThere is new trending of NFT cartoon Avatars generated by AI. Do you participate any of these projects which backed by reputed organizations?What reputable organizations are you talking about? What ever it is it doesn't sound like i would join into something like that. I follow NFTs and haven't seen this trend, or haven't seen that in a way that ai art would interest anyone as it takes zero effort. Cartoon avatars for sure there's some demand for those i mean starting from BAYC, but ai generated is garbage.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: honestly if it's free minting, there's no problem in following the trend, also they usually acts like some kind of membership identity in NFT and could have some value, there has been many such similar NFT tokens generated through AI that somehow got some value.The thing with these trend is that, this means doesn't matter if the arts is pure shit, it's still got some value as long as it have some relation with big company. Even AI generated NFT that is supposed to be valueless since quite literally everyone could just generate one could be used for NFT kinda speaks volume that NFT itself is actually just a trend that's like meme coin which might be a good thing for some that speculate even though certainly it might be waste of time and money.

comments.author: Desmong
comments.body: Quote from: rahulzx on March 06, 2023, 08:42:18 AMThere is new trending of NFT cartoon Avatars generated by AI. Do you participate any of these projects which backed by reputed organizations? I have  it seen any of these project, maybe I look out for some of them that are hosted by good project team. NFT is becoming popular everyday and I still see some persons discriminating NFT of not been there choice. Everyone of us has a chose to decide what they want but not to discriminate. I like NFT because is has fantastic use.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Quote from: rahulzx on March 06, 2023, 08:42:18 AMThere is new trending of NFT cartoon Avatars generated by AI. Do you participate any of these projects which backed by reputed organizations?Those cartoon are just worthless NFT and nothing special about those kinds of NFT. Even though if those NFT are issued by a reputed organization and then it doesn't mean those NFT will be priced so high like some garbage NFT that are priced at tens ethereum. NFT was pretty much the same like token as it can be easily issued anytime to be sold to the public by create a minting campaign. The users can paid money to mint it. I have ever participated a few times but all of my NFTs worthless. It has not value and token is far better compared with it. I just say the truth

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: rahulzx on March 06, 2023, 08:42:18 AMThere is new trending of NFT cartoon Avatars generated by AI. Do you participate any of these projects which backed by reputed organizations?If I am not mistaken the works of art generated by an AI do not have any kind of copyright protection, so they are free to use and no one holds any rights over them.With this in mind what you are proposing is the equivalent of paying for the tickets of a concert that was offered for free, so you are wasting your money no matter how I look at this, that being said even if the NFTs were created by humans I would never participate in something like this as the majority of NFTs are scams anyway.

comments.author: Venik
comments.body: NFT trends come and go, I don't think it's really worth trying to follow it tbh. I think you need a lot of luck and market knowledge to make money there.
